title: Diamond Petal Cascade Jhumka Earrings
materials: featuring meticulously pave-set cubic zirconia stones. Adorned with pale pink gemstones for a delicate contrast. Expertly crafted Hyderabadi finish for lasting shine.
features: A modern take on the classic Jhumka, these earrings feature a cascading petal design. The intricate pave setting of cubic zirconia creates a brilliant sparkle. The petal pattern, highlighted by the pink gemstones, adds a touch of femininity and elegance. The design is lightweight for comfortable wear despite its impressive appearance.
colors: Silver/White (from the cubic zirconia) with pale pink accents.
occasions: or adding a touch of glamour to a special occasion. Also suitable for modern celebrations and parties.
description: These stunning Jhumka earrings offer a contemporary twist on a traditional design. The sparkling cubic zirconia and delicate pink gemstones create a sophisticated and eye-catching look. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, these earrings are perfect for adding a touch of glamour to any outfit.
